roleset.name: add a substance to alter performance
roleset.note: DOPE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search and wordnet. Added because none existed. Member of Vncls 9.8. Comparison to 'inject'.Roleset by Julia. (from dope.01-v)

role.descr: patient/destination, what/who the dope is being put into
the dope, substance that is being added

example.name: dope-v: intransitive, sports frame
example.text: Bjarne Riis admitted he was doping when he won the 1996 Tour.

example.name: dope-v: passive, patient Arg-1
example.text: Dowdy maintains that [she]-1 was doped *trace*-1 with GHB, a date-rape drug.

example.name: dope-v: all arguments, patient Arg-1
example.text: He doped the child with wine mixed in water.

example.name: dope-v: All arguments, destination Arg-1, chemistry frame
example.text: He doped the nematic liquid crystal, butoxy benzoric acid, with the dye.
example.arg: the nematic liquid crystal, butoxy benzoric acid,

example.name: dope-v: passive with destination Arg-1
example.text: [Different gasoline blends]-1 were doped *trace*-1 with used engine oil.

roleset.name: smear with a liquid substance (as a lubricant or glue)
roleset.note: DOPE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added because none existed. Member of Vncls 9.9. Comparison to 'lubricate'.Roleset by Julia. (from dope.02-v)

role.descr: destination, thing being slathered with liquid substance

example.name: dope-v: other liquid substance frame, all args
example.text: She doped the surface with photographic emulsion.

example.name: dope-v: glue application frame, all arguments
example.text: Then he doped the metal skirt at the base of the fitting with Krazy Glue.
example.arg: the metal skirt at the base of the fitting

example.name: dope-v: plumbing lubrication frame
example.text: He didn't use any pipe dope on the union, but he doped the threaded connections on the union.
example.arg: the threaded connections on the union.

roleset.name: fly, hip, rad
roleset.note: DOPE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from dope.01-j)

example.name: dope-j: arg1, and just about as many interjections as you can have
example.text: Oh shit ye that would be dope fool let me know

roleset.name: dope_up: dose with narcotics
roleset.note: DOPE_UP-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search and wordnet. Added because none existed. Member of Vncls 9.8. Comparison to 'inject'.Roleset by Julia. (from dope.03-v)

role.descr: patient/destination, thing/person the dope is being put into

example.name: dope_up-v (or could be treed as doped_up-j)
example.text: I-1, too, was doped up *-1 on laughing gas...
